long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instantly chat with Bard AI with this Chrome extension.

Bard AI, a chat-based AI tool powered by Google Bard, it is your virtual conversation partner. It emulates human conversation and draws its responses from the web. Just like other chat assistants, Bard AI excels at coding, math problem-solving, and aiding with writing tasks.

Using Bard AI is simple. Click the toolbar to open the popup window and engage in a conversation with the Google Bard AI chatbot whenever you wish. Whether you're browsing the web or enjoying YouTube videos, this extension facilitates intelligent dialogues with Bard AI right alongside your current browser window. It's designed for quick and user-friendly chats, even offering a dark mode for comfortable viewing. Your feedback is invaluable for enhancing the extension, so share your thoughts and enjoy the effortless interaction with Google Bard AI as you surf the web.

Bard AI is now seamlessly integrated with your Google apps and services. Utilize Bard AI with Google tools to access answers and features across various platforms. Bard Extensions introduce a novel way to converse and collaborate with Bard. Extensions enable Bard to retrieve and present valuable information from your daily Google tools such as Gmail, Docs, Drive, Google Maps, YouTube, and Google Flights and hotels, even when this information is spread across different apps and services.

Explore Bard AI FAQ here: https://Bard.google.com/faq

To sign in to Bard, follow these steps:

Visit https://Bard.google.com.
In the top right corner, click 'Sign in.'
Log in with your personal Google Account.

Some people may not be able to access Bard AI for a variety of reasons, including location, age, or type of account, among others. If you canâ€™t access or use the Bard web app now, you can try again later.
